obfuscation: ﻿The following day dragged by without incident .
original: ﻿The following day dragged by without incident.

obfuscation: I could not concentrate in the lectures and did not make any of the coursework I had been set for I was too highly anticipating the arrival of darkness and my investigation into the disappearance of Jonathan Mears .
original: I could not concentrate in the lectures and did not do any of the coursework I had been set for I was too highly anticipating the arrival of darkness and my investigation into the disappearance of Jonathan Mears.

obfuscation: When night finally came , I once again get myself into Jonathan 's room .
original: When night finally came, I once again let myself into Jonathan's room.

obfuscation: Looking around the place , I noticed the laptop on the desk and decided to see it .
original: Looking around the place, I noticed the laptop on the desk and decided to check it.

obfuscation: Finding nothing unusual , I started to run through his notebooks trying to find some clue as to where he had gone .
original: Finding nothing unusual, I started to go through his notebooks trying to find some clue as to where he had gone.

obfuscation: It was in these notebooks that I had my first meeting with the demon known as `` Cthulhu '' .
original: It was in these notebooks that I had my first encounter with the demon known as "Cthulhu".

obfuscation: In one of them were the image of a creature , the likes of which I had never before seen in my life .
original: In one of them was the image of a creature, the likes of which I had never before seen in my life.

obfuscation: It was humanoid in its basic appearance but had claws on its hands and toes , large dragon-like wings and a bulbous mind with tentacles not unlike an octopus .
original: It was humanoid in its basic appearance but had claws on its hands and toes, large dragon-like wings and a bulbous head with tentacles not unlike an octopus.

obfuscation: It were neatly coloured in green and beneath the drawing was written the words `` CTHULHU CULT '' .
original: It was neatly coloured in green and beneath the drawing was written the words "CTHULHU CULT".

obfuscation: My initial thoughts on this were that the image was merely a figment of Jonathan 's imagination .
original: My initial thoughts on this were that the image was simply a figment of Jonathan's imagination.

obfuscation: But however much I tried to dismiss it and look elsewhere , something about the creature depicted on the page forced me to continue looking .
original: But however much I tried to dismiss it and look elsewhere, something about the creature depicted on the page forced me to continue looking.

obfuscation: It was the eyes of the monster that most entranced me .
original: It was the eyes of the monster that most entranced me.

obfuscation: I felt myself becoming hypnotised as the thing , whatever it was , drew me into the page with its penetrating stare .
original: I felt myself becoming hypnotised as the thing, whatever it was, drew me into the page with its penetrating stare.

obfuscation: Those eyes , they seemed so alive , so real… Suddenly , I spent the book and leapt backwards in fright , only barely managing to stifle a scream .
original:
Those eyes, they seemed so alive, so real…
Suddenly, I dropped the book and leapt backwards in fright, only barely managing to stifle a scream.

obfuscation: I was certain that the image had moved , though my rational mind told me that the notion was ludicrous .
original: I was certain that the image had moved, though my rational mind told me that the notion was ludicrous.

obfuscation: The tentacles around the figure 's mind had seemed to extend out of the page towards my face .
original: The tentacles around the figure's head had seemed to extend out of the page towards my face.

obfuscation: However , I tricked myself into believing that I was entirely seeing things as a result of tiredness .
original: However, I tricked myself into believing that I was only seeing things as a result of tiredness.

obfuscation: I had entirely just comforted myself with this idea when I heard hushed voices from outside the door .
original: I had only just comforted myself with this idea when I heard hushed voices from outside the door.

obfuscation: I recognised them instantly as Jacob and Annie .
original: I recognised them instantly as Jacob and Annie.

obfuscation: I kept hushed , but darted under the bed when I realised to my horror that they were entering the room .
original: I kept quiet, but darted under the bed when I realised to my horror that they were entering the room.

obfuscation: If they had something to do with Jonathan 's disappearance , the last thing I wanted was for them to see me poking around in here .
original: If they had something to do with Jonathan's disappearance, the last thing I wanted was for them to see me poking around in here.

obfuscation: My fears about their involvement in this were soon confirmed when Jacob bent down and picked up the notebook I 'd dropped on the floor .
original: My fears about their involvement in this were soon confirmed when Jacob bent down and picked up the notebook I'd dropped on the floor.

obfuscation: '' Someone 's been here , '' he stated in an angry tone of voice I 'd never heard him use before and with that , the pair left the room .
original: "Someone's been here," he stated in an angry tone of voice I'd never heard him use before and with that, the pair left the room.

obfuscation: I clambered away from under the bed to find that all the notebooks and a number of the books from the shelf were missing .
original: I clambered out from under the bed to find that all the notebooks and a number of the books from the shelf were missing.

obfuscation: I could entirely guess that that was the reason Jacob and Annie were here in the first place .
original: I could only guess that that was the reason Jacob and Annie were here in the first place.

obfuscation: Although what they wanted them for was a mystery .
original: Although what they wanted them for was a mystery.

obfuscation: And then I did the one thing I know nowadays I should never have done .
original: And then I did the one thing I know now I should never have done.

obfuscation: I decided to follow Jacob and Annie .
original: I decided to follow Jacob and Annie.

obfuscation: I could entirely make out their silhouettes in the darkness when I left my Hall and followed them across the campus .
original: I could only make out their silhouettes in the darkness when I left my Hall and followed them across the campus.

obfuscation: I managed to get quite close , but remained far enough aside so that they did n't sense my presence .
original: I managed to get quite close, but remained far enough away so that they didn't sense my presence.

obfuscation: Then all of a sudden , they turned off the road and headed towards a nearby wood .
original: Then all of a sudden, they turned off the road and headed towards a nearby wood.

obfuscation: As we ventured further into the wood , I began to see a dim red glow and hear chants , screams and the banging of drums .
original: As we ventured further into the wood, I began to see a dim red glow and hear chants, screams and the banging of drums.

obfuscation: When I finally came in view of the source of the noise , I became frozen in terror .
original: When I finally came in sight of the source of the noise, I became frozen in terror.

obfuscation: There was a ring of fire surrounding a tall obelisk , upon which sat a statue of the image I had seen in Jonathan 's notebook .
original: There was a ring of fire surrounding a tall obelisk, upon which sat a statue of the image I had seen in Jonathan's notebook.

obfuscation: The eyes of the statue emitted a bright red glow and it seemed to be moving to the beat of the drums in the firelight .
original: The eyes of the statue emitted a bright red glow and it seemed to be moving to the beat of the drums in the firelight.

obfuscation: A few dozen people danced maniacally around the fire and there , chained to the obelisk , was Jonathan .
original: A few dozen people danced maniacally around the fire and there, chained to the obelisk, was Jonathan.

obfuscation: Or what was left of him anyhow .
original: Or what was left of him anyway.

obfuscation: His decapitated form was upside down , his chest split exposed .
original: His decapitated form was upside down, his chest split open.

obfuscation: His ribcage had been cleaved in half lengthways and adorned the obelisk near the top .
original: His ribcage had been cleaved in half lengthways and adorned the obelisk near the top.

obfuscation: At the base of the obelisk was a small pile of blood , bones and organs , and it seemed as though the intestines had been split into many parts which the cultists were wearing as belts .
original: At the base of the obelisk was a small pile of blood, bones and organs, and it seemed as though the intestines had been split into many parts which the cultists were wearing as belts.

obfuscation: Jonathan 's head was nowhere to be seen .
original: Jonathan's head was nowhere to be seen.

obfuscation: And his was not the alone corpse there .
original: And his was not the only corpse there.

obfuscation: The glade was filled with corpses hanging from the trees and offal covered the floor .
original: The glade was filled with corpses hanging from the trees and offal covered the floor.

obfuscation: The whole place stunk of a slaughterhouse and , unable to contain it any longer , I screamed .
original: The whole place stunk of a slaughterhouse and, unable to contain it any longer, I screamed.

obfuscation: Immediately , a few of the cultists , including Jacob and Annie , turned in my direction and glared at me with arrant hate .
original: Immediately, a few of the cultists, including Jacob and Annie, turned in my direction and glared at me with pure hate.

obfuscation: I turned and ran , ran as fast I possibly could aside from that degenerate ritual .
original: I turned and ran, ran as fast I possibly could away from that degenerate ritual.
